casebody.data:
NELSON
v.
NELSON. No. 508A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2006. K. Edward Greene, Raleigh, Adrienne E. Allison, Richard B. Hager, Sanford, for Carrie Nelson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of November 2006 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Estate of Melvin Nelson) shall have up to and including the 15th day of January, 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of December 2006."
